validator.meltingpoint module¶

class validator.meltingpoint.MeltingpointValidator(directory: Union[str, Path], task_params: dict)¶

Bases: AbstractValidator

Estimate the melting point from a series of MD simulations.

For nanoparticles, the lindeman index is used. MD simulations with various initial temperatures are performed. For bulk, phase co-existence approach is used. Different initial temperatures are set for solid and liquid, where the steady state is found.

run(trajectories: List[List[Atoms]], temperatures: List[float])¶

validator.utils module¶

validator.utils.get_properties(frames: List[Atoms], other_props=[])¶

Get properties of frames for comparison.

Currently, only total energy and forces are considered.

Returns

shape (nframes,) tot_energies: shape (nframes,) tot_forces: shape (nframes,3)

Return type

tot_symbols
